missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} Doors are locked.
{-} A hero can attack the northern door (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} The mission will progress when the first captive has been found.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

A light on your datapad blinks faster as you approach the location where the Rebel operatives are being held. As you round a corner, you hear an officer shout, "Intruder alert!" and you are ambushed by the prison's guards.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Doors are locked.
{-} A hero can attack the northern door (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} The mission will progress when the first captive has been found.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.shortText: Find and rescue the two captives (&Captives rescued&/2).

events.eventText:
With rocket explosions at your heels you drag the captives to safety beyond the facility, gasping and wheezing. A search is initiated, but you maintain a well-hidden position until the red glow of 0-0-0's eyes disappears.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

As you fumble and scramble through the chaos of the battle trying to find a safe escape, you look back. You see the operatives you were tasked with saving back in the custody of stormtroopers, being dragged before 0-0-0 and BT-1 once more. The droids' displays glow maliciously red.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} The Empire receives <color="red">0-0-0</color> (Specialized in Pain) and <color="red">BT-1</color> (Destructive Assassin) as villains.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
Behind the door, rooms and corridors lead deeper into the dingy facility.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A security door leads deeper into the base.

{-} A hero can attack the door (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}).

eventActions.tbText:
Behind a door in a far corner, screams of pain and sobs can be heard. Another door in a long corridor lit by dim red lights appears to lead into a holding cell.

{-} A hero can attack the doors to the interrogation room and the cell (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}).
Troopers ready their weapons as you enter.

events.eventText: Behind the door, an appalling sight awaits you: You have walked into an interrogation room, filled with instruments and devices clearly meant for torture.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Screams of pain can be heard from behind this door.

{-} A hero can attack the door (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}).

eventActions.tbText: A black protocol droid with shocking red eyes stands over a Rebel operative splayed on a torture table. "Oh, I'm sorry," the droid says. "We're terribly busy at the moment; could you come back another time?" He raises his electrified palm.
On the table, Suan Et'deam, a Bothan spy fiercely loyal to the Alliance, is writhing in pain and terror. She looks at you and forms a silent "Help me!" with her lips.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
If you can make it here, the captives will be safe.

{-} When a captive enters the entrance, click "Captive rescued".
{-} When a captive is defeated, click "Captive defeated".

eventActions.tbText:
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent captives (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {F}). At the start of a Status Phase, each captive adjacent to a hero may move up to 3 spaces. When a captive enters the entrance, the captive is rescued. If this happens, click the entrance and select "Captive rescued".
{-} Once per activation, a hero can suffer 1 {C} to push and adjacent captive up to 2 spaces.
{-} If a captive is adjacent to a healthy hero, it cannot suffer {H}. If a captive is defeated, click the entrance and select "Captive defeated".

Seeing Suan like fills you with determination, and you advance, weapons drawn.

{-} Each Rebel figure gains 2 movement points.
{-} The Rebels win when both captives are rescued.
{-} The Rebels lose when a captive is defeated or when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Doors are locked.
{-} A hero can attack the doors to the interrogation room and the cell (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent captives (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {F}). At the start of a Status Phase, each captive adjacent to a hero may move up to 3 spaces. When a captive enters the entrance, the captive is rescued. If this happens, click the entrance and select "Captive rescued".
{-} Once per activation, a hero can suffer 1 {C} to push and adjacent captive up to 2 spaces.
{-} If a captive is adjacent to a healthy hero, it cannot suffer {H}. If a captive is defeated, click the entrance and select "Captive defeated".
{-} The Rebels win when both captives are rescued.
{-} The Rebels lose when a captive is defeated or when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: You hurry one of the exhausted captives to safety.

You hurry the captives toward the exit.

{-} Each captive adjacent to a hero may move up to 3 spaces.

eventActions.mainText: Have all captives escaped through the entrance?

events.eventText: Alarms keep blaring through the facility.
The door opens into a tiny holding cell.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The door in the dimly lit hall appears to lead into a cell.

{-} A hero can attack the door (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}).

eventActions.tbText: Soday Len, a Pau'an slicer, looks up and blinks in the sudden light. Then his face is flushed with relief. "Finally," he gasps. "I'd almost given up hope."

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
If you can make it here, the captives will be safe.

{-} When a captive enters the entrance, click "Captive rescued".
{-} When a captive is defeated, click "Captive defeated".

eventActions.tbText:
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent captives (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {F}). At the start of a Status Phase, each captive adjacent to a hero may move up to 3 spaces. When a captive enters the entrance, the captive is rescued. If this happens, click the entrance and select "Captive rescued".
{-} Once per activation, a hero can suffer 1 {C} to push and adjacent captive up to 2 spaces.
{-} If a captive is adjacent to a healthy hero, it cannot suffer {H}. If a captive is defeated, click the entrance and select "Captive defeated".

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A heavy blast door is locking you out of the center of the base.

{-} The door is locked.

eventActions.tbText: You have barely entered the cell when the door to the hall is blasted away in a large explosion. In the door frame stands a small silhouette: an astromech droid. A terrifying array of weapons is mounted to its chassis.
Behind the droid, more enemies lie in wait to blast you to pieces.

You ready your weapons to face the new threat.

{-} The Rebels win when both captives are rescued.
{-} The Rebels lose when a captive is defeated or when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Doors are locked.
{-} A hero can attack the doors to the interrogation room and the cell (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent captives (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {F}). At the start of a Status Phase, each captive adjacent to a hero may move up to 3 spaces. When a captive enters the entrance, the captive is rescued. If this happens, click the entrance and select "Captive rescued".
{-} Once per activation, a hero can suffer 1 {C} to push and adjacent captive up to 2 spaces.
{-} If a captive is adjacent to a healthy hero, it cannot suffer {H}. If a captive is defeated, click the entrance and select "Captive defeated".
{-} The Rebels win when both captives are rescued.

mapEntities.mainText:
A heavy blast door is locking you out of the center of the base.

{-} The door is locked.

A security door leads deeper into the base.

{-} A hero can attack the door (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}).

Screams of pain can be heard from behind this door.

{-} A hero can attack the door (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}).

The door in the dimly lit hall appears to lead into a cell.

{-} A hero can attack the door (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}).

If you can make it here, the captives will be safe.

{-} When a captive enters the entrance, click "Captive rescued".
{-} When a captive is defeated, click "Captive defeated".
